sentences.en: A little while, lackey goes to disintegrate, leaf two bundle come out in the private parts.
sentences.cn: 一会儿, 仆人将瓦解去, 又将荷叶两块束在下身出来.

sentences.en: Full as a lackey, a Hara, the pro - Japanese as slaves!
sentences.cn: 十足的一副奴才像, 一副哈日 、 亲日的奴才像!

sentences.en: Gentlewoman calls out lackey, swift end gives dish of hamburger to look to this individual.
sentences.cn: 贵妇人便唤仆人, 快端出盘肉饼给这个人看看.

sentences.en: I'm not staying as a paid lackey to act as your yes-man.
sentences.cn: 我不要再做拿钱任你使唤的应声虫。

sentences.en: In the evening stay because bedding is insufficient, host and host sleep, lackey and lackey sleep.
sentences.cn: 晚上留宿因被褥不够, 主人和主人睡, 仆人和仆人睡.

sentences.en: It is lackey sends a package so.
sentences.cn: 原来是仆人送进来一件包裹.

sentences.en: Lackey says: " Consider your mouth only, not consider my mouth. "
sentences.cn: 仆人说: “ 只顾你的嘴, 莫顾我的嘴. ”

sentences.en: Not a little while lackey came back, ask him: " Was scolded? "
sentences.cn: 不一会儿仆人就回来了, 问他: “ 骂了 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: Or stood a lackey in the House of Pain.
sentences.cn: 也不会是侍立在痛苦之屋中的仆人.

sentences.en: The Famen Temple, Chia Kuei is a trusted lackey of Liu Chin , a Ming Dynasty eunuch.
sentences.cn: 贾桂是京剧《法门寺》里明朝宦官 刘瑾 的亲信奴才.

trans.tran_cn: 听差，男仆（通常穿制服），卑躬屈膝的人，被待为奴仆的人
